description.value:
You conjure a red raincloud in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 60 feet, which pours rust-colored rain directly below it. Any creature in the rain with the metal trait, that is made of metal, or is wearing metal armor is covered in corrosive build-up. Any such creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} as long as it remains in the area. If such a creature is in the rain at the start of its turn, it takes @Damage[(floor((max(4,@actor.level)-4)/2)+3)d6[untyped]] damage with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classDC.value)|basic:true] save against your class DC, plus @Damage[1d6[persistent,untyped]] damage if it fails. Damage from this impulse ignores Hardness.

Level (+2) The initial damage increases by 1d6.
